ingredients.ingredient: ¼ pound ripe Brie cheese, cut into 24 small chunks
1 ripe pear, cut into small dice

cookingTips: Keep phyllo shells cool until ready to fill to prevent drying
Dice pear just before assembly to prevent browning
Bake at 350°F for 8-10 minutes until shells crisp and cheese melts slightly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These elegant appetizers combine creamy cheese with fresh fruit. Are you comfortable assembling small pastries and working with delicate phyllo shells?
